A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: No strong male figure throughout the entire movie. While it was great to see some strong female characters\, it just seemed as though there was too much agenda throughout the movie. Reverse racism\, sexism\, and anti-religion. The action on the other hand was great\, lots of filler to get through in order to enjoy it. Disney sold out a long time ago before they were in a galaxy far far away.
